info.title: Task Management API
info.description: A professional REST API for task and project management with PostgreSQL database

post.description: Create a new user account and receive authentication token
Authenticate user and receive access token

get.description: Retrieve all projects belonging to authenticated user

post.description: Create a new project for authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a specific project by ID

delete.description: Delete a project and all its associated tasks

get.description: Retrieve all tags belonging to authenticated user with task count

post.description: Create a new tag for authenticated user (name must be unique per user)

422.description: Validation error or duplicate tag name

message.example: Tag with this name already exists

get.description: Retrieve a specific tag by ID with task count

put.description: Update an existing tag (name must be unique per user)

422.description: Validation error or duplicate tag name

delete.description: Delete a tag and remove it from all associated tasks

get.description: Retrieve all tasks belonging to authenticated user, sorted by due_date

post.description: Create a new task for authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve a specific task by ID with relationships

bearerAuth.description: Enter your Bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
